com.google.crypto.tink.hybrid.internal

Interface HpkeAead

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AesGcmHpkeAead

    @Immutable
public interface HpkeAead
    Interface for Hybrid Public Key Encryption (HPKE) authenticated encryption with associated data (AEAD).

    HPKE I.-D. is available at https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-irtf-cfrg-hpke-12.html.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getAeadId()
      Returns the HPKE AEAD algorithm identifier for the underlying AEAD implementation.
      int getKeyLength()
      Returns key length (in bytes) for this algorithm (i.e., parameter 'Nk' in HPKE I.-D.).
      int getNonceLength()
      Returns nonce length (in bytes) for this algorithm (i.e., parameter 'Nn' in HPKE I.-D.).
      byte[] open(byte[] key, byte[] nonce, byte[] ciphertext, byte[] associatedData)
      Performs authenticated decryption of ciphertext and associatedData using key and nonce according to the HPKE AEAD specification.
      byte[] seal(byte[] key, byte[] nonce, byte[] plaintext, byte[] associatedData)
      Performs authenticated encryption of plaintext and associatedData using key and nonce according to the HPKE AEAD specification.

    • Method Detail

      • seal

        byte[] seal(byte[] key,
            byte[] nonce,
            byte[] plaintext,
            byte[] associatedData)
     throws GeneralSecurityException
        Performs authenticated encryption of plaintext and associatedData using key and nonce according to the HPKE AEAD specification.

        More details available at https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-irtf-cfrg-hpke-12.html#name-encryption-and-decryption.

        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException

      • open

        byte[] open(byte[] key,
            byte[] nonce,
            byte[] ciphertext,
            byte[] associatedData)
     throws GeneralSecurityException
        Performs authenticated decryption of ciphertext and associatedData using key and nonce according to the HPKE AEAD specification.

        More details available at https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-irtf-cfrg-hpke-12.html#name-encryption-and-decryption.

        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException

      • getAeadId

        byte[] getAeadId()
          throws GeneralSecurityException
        Returns the HPKE AEAD algorithm identifier for the underlying AEAD implementation.

        More details at https://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-irtf-cfrg-hpke-12.html#name-authenticated-encryption-wi.

        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException

      • getKeyLength

        int getKeyLength()
        Returns key length (in bytes) for this algorithm (i.e., parameter 'Nk' in HPKE I.-D.).

      • getNonceLength

        int getNonceLength()
        Returns nonce length (in bytes) for this algorithm (i.e., parameter 'Nn' in HPKE I.-D.).
